title: System Design Store
description: A curated collection of system design examples to help you master the art of designing scalable systems. Perfect for interview preparation and learning best practices.

choosing-the-right-database.title: Choosing the Right Database
choosing-the-right-database.description: Understand the differences between SQL and NoSQL databases, and learn how to choose the right one for your application.

design-uber.title: Design Uber
design-uber.description: Design a ride-sharing application like Uber, focusing on real-time location tracking, ride matching, and fare calculation.

design-twitter.title: Design Twitter
design-twitter.description: Design a social media platform like Twitter, focusing on tweet storage, user timelines, and follower relationships.

design-url-shortener.title: Design a URL Shortener
design-url-shortener.description: Design a URL shortening service like Bitly, focusing on generating short URLs, redirecting, and analytics tracking.

design-online-bookstore.title: Design an Online Bookstore
design-online-bookstore.description: Design an online bookstore like Amazon, focusing on product catalog, user reviews, and order processing.

design-chat-application.title: Design a Chat Application
design-chat-application.description: Design a real-time chat application like WhatsApp, focusing on message delivery, user presence, and group chats.

design-video-streaming-service.title: Design a Video Streaming Service
design-video-streaming-service.description: Design a video streaming platform like Netflix, focusing on content delivery, user recommendations, and subscription management.

design-file-storage-service.title: Design a File Storage Service
design-file-storage-service.description: Design a cloud file storage service like Dropbox, focusing on file upload/download, synchronization, and sharing.

design-news-feed-system.title: Design a News Feed System
design-news-feed-system.description: Design a news feed system like Facebook, focusing on content ranking, user interactions, and real-time updates.

design-online-payment-system.title: Design an Online Payment System
design-online-payment-system.description: Design an online payment system like PayPal, focusing on transaction processing, fraud detection, and security.

design-ride-sharing-application.title: Design a Ride-Sharing Application
design-ride-sharing-application.description: Design a ride-sharing application like Lyft, focusing on driver-rider matching, fare calculation, and real-time tracking.

design-food-delivery-service.title: Design a Food Delivery Service
design-food-delivery-service.description: Design a food delivery service like DoorDash, focusing on restaurant management, order processing, and delivery tracking.

design-collaborative-document-editing-to.title: Design a Collaborative Document Editing Tool
design-collaborative-document-editing-to.description: Design a collaborative document editing tool like Google Docs, focusing on real-time collaboration, version control, and access management.

design-job-search-platform.title: Design a Job Search Platform
design-job-search-platform.description: Design a job search platform like LinkedIn, focusing on job listings, user profiles, and recommendation algorithms.

design-travel-booking-system.title: Design a Travel Booking System
design-travel-booking-system.description: Design a travel booking system like Expedia, focusing on flight/hotel search, booking management, and payment processing.

design-fitness-tracking-application.title: Design a Fitness Tracking Application
design-fitness-tracking-application.description: Design a fitness tracking application like Strava, focusing on activity tracking, social features, and data visualization.

design-music-streaming-service.title: Design a Music Streaming Service
design-music-streaming-service.description: Design a music streaming service like Spotify, focusing on music catalog, user playlists, and recommendation algorithms.

design-real-time-collaboration-platform.title: Design a Real-Time Collaboration Platform
design-real-time-collaboration-platform.description: Design a real-time collaboration platform like Slack, focusing on messaging, file sharing, and integrations.

design-online-learning-platform.title: Design an Online Learning Platform
design-online-learning-platform.description: Design an online learning platform like Coursera, focusing on course management, user progress tracking, and content delivery.

design-social-media-analytics-tool.title: Design a Social Media Analytics Tool
design-social-media-analytics-tool.description: Design a social media analytics tool like Hootsuite, focusing on data aggregation, sentiment analysis, and reporting.

design-virtual-event-platform.title: Design a Virtual Event Platform
design-virtual-event-platform.description: Design a virtual event platform like Hopin, focusing on event management, live streaming, and attendee engagement.
